00034     [Serializable]
00035     public class ComplexMatrix :
00036         IMatrix<Complex>,
00037         ICloneable
00038     {
00039 
00040         int _rowCount;
00041         int _columnCount;
00042 
00046         Complex[][] _data;
00047 
00051         public int RowCount
00052         {
00053             get { return _rowCount; }
00054         }
00055 
00059         public int ColumnCount
00060         {
00061             get { return _columnCount; }
00062         }
00063 
00070         public Complex this[int i, int j]
00071         {
00072             get
00073             {
00074                 return _data[i][j];
00075             }
00076 
00077             set
00078             {
00079                 _data[i][j] = value;
00080 
00081                 // NOTE (cdr, 2008-03-11): The folloing line is cheap,
00082                 // but still expensive if this setter is called
00083                 // a lot of times.
00084                 // - We should recommend out users to build the internal
00085                 //   jagged array first and then create the matrix for it;
00086                 //   or to get the internal double[][] handle.
00087                 // - Consider to omit it here and make the users call
00088                 //   ResetComputations() after they finished chaniging the matrix.
00089                 ResetOnDemandComputations();
00090             }
00091         }

00100         public
00101         ComplexMatrix(
00102             int m,
00103             int n
00104             )
00105         {
00106             _data = CreateMatrixData(m, n);
00107             _rowCount = m;
00108             _columnCount = n;
00109 
00110             InitOnDemandComputations();
00111         }

00118         public
00119         ComplexMatrix(
00120             int m,
00121             Complex s
00122             )
00123         {
00124             _data = new Complex[m][];
00125             _rowCount = m;
00126             _columnCount = m;
00127 
00128             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00129             {
00130                 Complex[] col = new Complex[m];
00131                 col[i] = s;
00132                 _data[i] = col;
00133             }
00134 
00135             InitOnDemandComputations();
00136         }

00156             {
00157                 Complex[] col = new Complex[n];

00159                 {

00184 
00185             InitOnDemandComputations();

00194         public
00195         ComplexMatrix(
00196             Complex[] vals,
00197             int m
00198             )
00199         {
00200             _rowCount = m;
00201             if(m == 0)
00202             {
00203                 _columnCount = 0;
00204                 if(vals.Length != 0)
00205                 {
00206                     throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(Resources.ArgumentVectorLengthsMultipleOf, "m"));
00207                 }
00208             }
00209             else
00210             {
00211                 int rem;
00212                 _columnCount = Math.DivRem(vals.Length, m, out rem);
00213                 if(rem != 0)
00214                 {
00215                     throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(Resources.ArgumentVectorLengthsMultipleOf, "m"));
00216                 }
00217             }
00218 
00219             _data = new Complex[_rowCount][];
00220             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00221             {
00222                 Complex[] col = new Complex[_columnCount];
00223                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00224                 {
00225                     col[j] = vals[i + j * _rowCount];
00226                 }
00227 
00228                 _data[i] = col;
00229             }
00230 
00231             InitOnDemandComputations();
00232         }
00233 
00238         public static
00239         ComplexMatrix
00240         Create(
00241             Complex[][] A
00242             )
00243         {
00244             return new ComplexMatrix(CloneMatrixData(A));
00245         }

00251         [CLSCompliant(false)]
00252         public static
00253         ComplexMatrix
00254         Create(
00255             Complex[,] A
00256             )
00257         {
00258             int rows = A.GetLength(0);
00259             int columns = A.GetLength(1);
00260             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[rows][];
00261 
00262             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00263             {
00264                 Complex[] col = new Complex[columns];
00265                 for(int j = 0; j < columns; j++)
00266                 {
00267                     col[j] = A[i, j];
00268                 }
00269 
00270                 newData[i] = col;
00271             }
00272 
00273             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
00274         }

00280         public static
00281         ComplexMatrix
00282         Create(
00283             IMatrix<double> realMatrix
00284             )
00285         {
00286             int rows = realMatrix.RowCount;
00287             int columns = realMatrix.ColumnCount;
00288             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[rows][];
00289 
00290             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00291             {
00292                 Complex[] col = new Complex[columns];
00293                 for(int j = 0; j < columns; j++)
00294                 {
00295                     col[j] = realMatrix[i, j];
00296                 }
00297 
00298                 newData[i] = col;
00299             }
00300 
00301             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
00302         }
00303 
00307         public static
00308         ComplexMatrix
00309         CreateFromColumns(
00310             IList<ComplexVector> columnVectors
00311             )
00312         {
00313             if(null == columnVectors)
00314             {
00315                 throw new ArgumentNullException("columnVectors");
00316             }
00317 
00318             if(0 == columnVectors.Count)
00319             {
00320                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnVectors");
00321             }
00322 
00323             int rows = columnVectors[0].Length;
00324             int columns = columnVectors.Count;
00325             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[rows][];
00326 
00327             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00328             {
00329                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[columns];
00330                 for(int j = 0; j < columns; j++)
00331                 {
00332                     newRow[j] = columnVectors[j][i];
00333                 }
00334 
00335                 newData[i] = newRow;
00336             }
00337 
00338             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
00339         }
00340 
00344         public static
00345         ComplexMatrix
00346         CreateFromRows(
00347             IList<ComplexVector> rowVectors
00348             )
00349         {
00350             if(null == rowVectors)
00351             {
00352                 throw new ArgumentNullException("columnVectors");
00353             }
00354 
00355             if(0 == rowVectors.Count)
00356             {
00357                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnVectors");
00358             }
00359 
00360             int rows = rowVectors.Count;
00361             int columns = rowVectors[0].Length;
00362             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[rows][];
00363 
00364             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00365             {
00366                 newData[i] = rowVectors[i].CopyToArray();
00367             }
00368 
00369             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
00370         }

00378         public static
00379         ComplexMatrix
00380         Identity(
00381             int m,
00382             int n
00383             )
00384         {
00385             Complex[][] data = new Complex[m][];
00386             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00387             {
00388                 Complex[] col = new Complex[n];
00389                 if(i < n)
00390                 {
00391                     col[i] = Complex.One;
00392                 }
00393 
00394                 data[i] = col;
00395             }
00396 
00397             return new ComplexMatrix(data);
00398         }
00399 
00409         public static
00410         ComplexMatrix
00411         Diagonal(
00412             IVector<Complex> diagonalVector,
00413             int m,
00414             int n
00415             )
00416         {
00417             Complex[][] data = new Complex[m][];
00418             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00419             {
00420                 Complex[] col = new Complex[n];
00421                 if((i < n) && (i < diagonalVector.Length))
00422                 {
00423                     col[i] = diagonalVector[i];
00424                 }
00425 
00426                 data[i] = col;
00427             }
00428 
00429             return new ComplexMatrix(data);
00430         }
00431

00444         {
00445             return Diagonal(diagonalVector, diagonalVector.Length, diagonalVector.Length);

00481         public static
00482         ComplexMatrix
00483         Random(
00484             int m,
00485             int n,
00486             IContinuousGenerator randomDistribution
00487             )
00488         {
00489             Complex[][] data = new Complex[m][];
00490             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00491             {
00492                 Complex[] col = new Complex[n];
00493                 for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00494                 {
00495                     col[j] = Complex.Random(
00496                         randomDistribution,
00497                         randomDistribution
00498                         );
00499                 }
00500 
00501                 data[i] = col;
00502             }
00503 
00504             return new ComplexMatrix(data);
00505         }

00514         public static
00515         ComplexMatrix
00516         RandomReal(
00517             int m,
00518             int n,
00519             IContinuousGenerator realRandomDistribution
00520             )
00521         {
00522             Complex[][] data = new Complex[m][];
00523             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00524             {
00525                 Complex[] col = new Complex[n];
00526                 for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00527                 {
00528                     col[j] = new Complex(
00529                         realRandomDistribution.NextDouble(),
00530                         0d
00531                         );
00532                 }
00533 
00534                 data[i] = col;
00535             }
00536 
00537             return new ComplexMatrix(data);
00538         }

00550         RandomPolar(
00551             int m,

00553             IContinuousGenerator modulusRandomDistribution,
00554             IContinuousGenerator argumentRandomDistribution
00555             )
00556         {

00560                 Complex[] col = new Complex[n];
00561                 for(int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00562                 {
00563                     col[j] = Complex.RandomPolar(
00564                         modulusRandomDistribution,
00565                         argumentRandomDistribution
00566                         );
00567                 }
00568

00570             }
00571 
00572             return new ComplexMatrix(data);
00573         }

00614         public
00615         Complex[,]
00616         CopyToArray()
00617         {
00618             Complex[,] newData = new Complex[_rowCount, _columnCount];
00619             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00620             {
00621                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
00622                 {
00623                     newData[i, j] = _data[i][j];
00624                 }
00625             }
00626 
00627             return newData;
00628         }

00636         CopyToJaggedArray()

00664         public static explicit
00665         operator Complex[](
00666             ComplexMatrix m
00667             )
00668         {
00669             if(m.ColumnCount != 1)
00670             {
00671                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSingleColumn);
00672             }
00673 
00674             Complex[] array = new Complex[m.RowCount];
00675             for(int i = 0; i < m.RowCount; i++)
00676             {
00677                 array[i] = m[i, 0];
00678             }
00679 
00680             return array;
00681         }
00682 
00687         public static explicit
00688         operator Complex(
00689             ComplexMatrix m
00690             )
00691         {
00692             if(m.ColumnCount != 1 || m.RowCount != 1)
00693             {
00694                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSingleColumnRow);
00695             }
00696 
00697             return m[0, 0];
00698         }

00711         public static
00712         Complex[][]
00713         CreateMatrixData(
00714             int m,
00715             int n
00716             )
00717         {
00718             Complex[][] data = new Complex[m][];
00719             for(int i = 0; i < m; i++)
00720             {
00721                 data[i] = new Complex[n];
00722             }
00723 
00724             return data;
00725         }
00726 
00730         public static
00731         Complex[][]
00732         CloneMatrixData(
00733             Complex[][] data
00734             )
00735         {
00736             int rows, columns;
00737             GetRowColumnCount(data, out rows, out columns);
00738             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[rows][];
00739             for(int i = 0; i < rows; i++)
00740             {
00741                 Complex[] col = new Complex[columns];
00742                 for(int j = 0; j < columns; j++)
00743                 {
00744                     col[j] = data[i][j];
00745                 }
00746 
00747                 newData[i] = col;
00748             }
00749 
00750             return newData;
00751         }
00752 
00756         public static
00757         void
00758         GetRowColumnCount(
00759             Complex[][] data,
00760             out int rows,
00761             out int columns
00762             )
00763         {
00764             rows = data.Length;
00765             columns = (rows == 0) ? 0 : data[0].Length;
00766         }

00770         #region Sub-matrices operation
00771 
00775         public
00776         ComplexVector
00777         GetColumnVector(
00778             int columnIndex
00779             )
00780         {
00781             if(columnIndex < 0 || columnIndex >= _columnCount)
00782             {
00783                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnIndex");
00784             }
00785 
00786             Complex[] newData = new Complex[_rowCount];
00787 
00788             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00789             {
00790                 newData[i] = _data[i][columnIndex];
00791             }
00792 
00793             return new ComplexVector(newData);
00794         }
00795 
00799         public
00800         ComplexVector
00801         GetRowVector(
00802             int rowIndex
00803             )
00804         {
00805             if(rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex >= _rowCount)
00806             {
00807                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("rowIndexs");
00808             }
00809 
00810             Complex[] newData = new Complex[_columnCount];
00811             _data[rowIndex].CopyTo(newData, 0);
00812 
00813             return new ComplexVector(newData);
00814         }
00815 
00819         public
00820         void
00821         SetColumnVector(
00822             IVector<Complex> columnVector,
00823             int columnIndex
00824             )
00825         {
00826             if(null == columnVector)
00827             {
00828                 throw new ArgumentNullException("columnVector");
00829             }
00830 
00831             if(columnIndex < 0 || columnIndex >= _columnCount)
00832             {
00833                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnIndex");
00834             }
00835 
00836             if(columnVector.Length != _rowCount)
00837             {
00838                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("columnVector");
00839             }
00840 
00841             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
00842             {
00843                 _data[i][columnIndex] = columnVector[i];
00844             }
00845 
00846             ResetOnDemandComputations();
00847         }
00848 
00852         public
00853         void
00854         SetRowVector(
00855             IVector<Complex> rowVector,
00856             int rowIndex
00857             )
00858         {
00859             if(null == rowVector)
00860             {
00861                 throw new ArgumentNullException("rowVector");
00862             }
00863 
00864             if(rowIndex < 0 || rowIndex >= _rowCount)
00865             {
00866                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("rowIndexs");
00867             }
00868 
00869             if(rowVector.Length != _columnCount)
00870             {
00871                 throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("rowVector");
00872             }
00873 
00874             _data[rowIndex] = rowVector.CopyToArray();
00875 
00876             ResetOnDemandComputations();
00877         }
00878 
00888         public
00889         ComplexMatrix
00890         GetMatrix(
00891             int i0,
00892             int i1,
00893             int j0,
00894             int j1
00895             )
00896         {
00897             Complex[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(i1 - i0 + 1, j1 - j0 + 1);
00898             try
00899             {
00900                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)
00901                 {
00902                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
00903                     {
00904                         newData[i - i0][j - j0] = _data[i][j];
00905                     }
00906                 }
00907             }
00908             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
00909             {
00910                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
00911             }
00912 
00913             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
00914         }
00915 
00923         public
00924         ComplexMatrix
00925         GetMatrix(
00926             int[] r,
00927             int[] c
00928             )
00929         {
00930             Complex[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(r.Length, c.Length);
00931             try
00932             {
00933                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
00934                 {
00935                     for(int j = 0; j < c.Length; j++)
00936                     {
00937                         newData[i][j] = _data[r[i]][c[j]];
00938                     }
00939                 }
00940             }
00941             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
00942             {
00943                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
00944             }
00945 
00946             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
00947         }

00968                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)

00973                     }

00976             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)

00992         public
00993         ComplexMatrix
00994         GetMatrix(
00995             int[] r,
00996             int j0,
00997             int j1
00998             )
00999         {
01000             Complex[][] newData = CreateMatrixData(r.Length, j1 - j0 + 1);
01001             try
01002             {
01003                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
01004                 {
01005                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
01006                     {
01007                         newData[i][j - j0] = _data[r[i]][j];
01008                     }
01009                 }
01010             }
01011             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01012             {
01013                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01014             }
01015 
01016             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
01017         }

01028         public
01029         void
01030         SetMatrix(
01031             int i0,
01032             int i1,
01033             int j0,
01034             int j1,
01035             IMatrix<Complex> X
01036             )
01037         {
01038             try
01039             {
01040                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)
01041                 {
01042                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
01043                     {
01044                         _data[i][j] = X[i - i0, j - j0];
01045                     }
01046                 }
01047             }
01048             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01049             {
01050                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01051             }
01052 
01053             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01054         }
01055 
01063         public
01064         void
01065         SetMatrix(
01066             int[] r,
01067             int[] c,
01068             IMatrix<Complex> X
01069             )
01070         {
01071             try
01072             {
01073                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
01074                 {
01075                     for(int j = 0; j < c.Length; j++)
01076                     {
01077                         _data[r[i]][c[j]] = X[i, j];
01078                     }
01079                 }
01080             }
01081             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01082             {
01083                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01084             }
01085 
01086             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01087         }
01088 
01097         public
01098         void
01099         SetMatrix(
01100             int[] r,
01101             int j0,
01102             int j1,
01103             IMatrix<Complex> X
01104             )
01105         {
01106             try
01107             {
01108                 for(int i = 0; i < r.Length; i++)
01109                 {
01110                     for(int j = j0; j <= j1; j++)
01111                     {
01112                         _data[r[i]][j] = X[i, j - j0];
01113                     }
01114                 }
01115             }
01116             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01117             {
01118                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01119             }
01120 
01121             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01122         }
01123 
01132         public
01133         void
01134         SetMatrix(
01135             int i0,
01136             int i1,
01137             int[] c,
01138             IMatrix<Complex> X
01139             )
01140         {
01141             try
01142             {
01143                 for(int i = i0; i <= i1; i++)
01144                 {
01145                     for(int j = 0; j < c.Length; j++)
01146                     {
01147                         _data[i][c[j]] = X[i - i0, j];
01148                     }
01149                 }
01150             }
01151             catch(IndexOutOfRangeException e)
01152             {
01153                 throw new IndexOutOfRangeException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixIndexOutOfRange, e);
01154             }
01155 
01156             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01157         }
01158 
01159         #endregion
01160 
01161         #region Norms computations
01162 
01165         public
01166         double
01167         Norm1()
01168         {
01169             // TODO (cdr, 2008-03-11): Change to property, consider cached on-demand.
01170             double f = 0;
01171             for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
01172             {
01173                 double s = 0;
01174                 for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
01175                 {
01176                     s += _data[i][j].Modulus;
01177                 }
01178 
01179                 f = Math.Max(f, s);
01180             }
01181 
01182             return f;
01183         }
01184 
01185         #endregion

01201         public
01202         ComplexMatrix
01203         Add(
01204             IMatrix<Complex> b
01205             )
01206         {
01207             CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(this, b);
01208 
01209             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[_rowCount][];
01210             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)
01211             {
01212                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
01213                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[_columnCount];
01214                 for(int j = 0; j < newRow.Length; j++)
01215                 {
01216                     newRow[j] = thisRow[j] + b[i, j];
01217                 }
01218 
01219                 newData[i] = newRow;
01220             }
01221 
01222             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
01223         }

01571         {
01572             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[_rowCount][];
01573             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)
01574             {
01575                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
01576                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[_columnCount];
01577                 for(int j = 0; j < newRow.Length; j++)
01578                 {
01579                     newRow[j] = -thisRow[j];
01580                 }
01581 
01582                 newData[i] = newRow;
01583             }
01584 
01585             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
01586         }

01667         public
01668         ComplexMatrix
01669         Multiply(
01670             IMatrix<Complex> b
01671             )
01672         {
01673             if(null == b)
01674             {
01675                 throw new ArgumentNullException("B");
01676             }
01677 
01678             if(b.RowCount != _columnCount)
01679             {
01680                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
01681             }
01682 
01683             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[_rowCount][];
01684             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)
01685             {
01686                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
01687                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[b.ColumnCount];
01688                 for(int j = 0; j < newRow.Length; j++)
01689                 {
01690                     Complex s = Complex.Zero;
01691                     for(int k = 0; k < _columnCount; k++)
01692                     {
01693                         s += thisRow[k] * b[k, j];
01694                     }
01695 
01696                     newRow[j] = s;
01697                 }
01698 
01699                 newData[i] = newRow;
01700             }
01701 
01702             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
01703 
01704             // TODO: The following code might be more performant for large
01705             // matrices. Measure and adapt if it indeed is faster.
01706 
01716 
01721 
01729 
01731         }
01732

01764             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)

01769                 {

01771                     for(int k = 0; k < _columnCount; k++)
01772                     {
01773                         s += thisRow[k] * b[k, j];
01774                     }
01775

01832         public
01833         void
01834         MultiplyInplace(
01835             IMatrix<Complex> b
01836             )
01837         {
01838             if(null == b)
01839             {
01840                 throw new ArgumentNullException("B");
01841             }
01842 
01843             if(_rowCount != _columnCount || b.RowCount != b.ColumnCount)
01844             {
01845                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSquare);
01846             }
01847 
01848             if(_rowCount != b.RowCount)
01849             {
01850                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
01851             }
01852 
01853             Complex[] tempRow = new Complex[_columnCount];
01854             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
01855             {
01856                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
01857                 for(int j = 0; j < tempRow.Length; j++)
01858                 {
01859                     Complex s = Complex.Zero;
01860                     for(int k = 0; k < thisRow.Length; k++)
01861                     {
01862                         s += thisRow[k] * b[k, j];
01863                     }
01864 
01865                     tempRow[j] = s;
01866                 }
01867 
01868                 _data[i] = tempRow;
01869                 tempRow = thisRow;
01870             }
01871 
01872             ResetOnDemandComputations();
01873         }
01874 
01886         public
01887         void
01888         MultiplyInplace(
01889             IMatrix<double> b
01890             )
01891         {
01892             if(null == b)
01893             {
01894                 throw new ArgumentNullException("B");
01895             }
01896 
01897             if(_rowCount != _columnCount || b.RowCount != b.ColumnCount)
01898             {
01899                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSquare);
01900             }
01901 
01902             if(_rowCount != b.RowCount)
01903             {
01904                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
01905             }
01906 
01907             Complex[] tempRow = new Complex[_columnCount];
01908             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
01909             {
01910                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
01911                 for(int j = 0; j < tempRow.Length; j++)
01912                 {
01913                     Complex s = Complex.Zero;
01914                     for(int k = 0; k < thisRow.Length; k++)
01915                     {
01916                         s += thisRow[k] * b[k, j];
01917                     }
01918 
01919                     tempRow[j] = s;
01920                 }
01921 
01922                 _data[i] = tempRow;
01923                 tempRow = thisRow;
01924             }
01925 
01926             ResetOnDemandComputations();

02278             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)
02279             {
02280                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
02281                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[_columnCount];
02282                 for(int j = 0; j < newRow.Length; j++)
02283                 {
02284                     newRow[j] = thisRow[j] * diagonal[j];
02285                 }
02286 
02287                 newData[i] = newRow;
02288             }
02289 
02290             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
02291         }
02292 
02301         public
02302         void
02303         MultiplyRightDiagonalInplace(
02304             IVector<Complex> diagonal
02305             )
02306         {
02307             if(null == diagonal)
02308             {
02309                 throw new ArgumentNullException("diagonal");
02310             }
02311 
02312             if(_columnCount != diagonal.Length)
02313             {
02314                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
02315             }
02316 
02317             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
02318             {
02319                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
02320                 for(int j = 0; j < thisRow.Length; j++)
02321                 {
02322                     thisRow[j] *= diagonal[j];
02323                 }
02324             }
02325 
02326             ResetOnDemandComputations();
02327         }
02328

02339         MultiplyRightDiagonalInplace(
02340             IVector<double> diagonal
02341             )
02342         {
02343             if(null == diagonal)
02344             {
02345                 throw new ArgumentNullException("diagonal");
02346             }
02347

02349             {
02350                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
02351             }

02354             {
02355                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
02356                 for(int j = 0; j < thisRow.Length; j++)
02357                 {

02360             }

02373         public
02374         ComplexMatrix
02375         Transpose()
02376         {
02377             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[_columnCount][];
02378             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)
02379             {
02380                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[_rowCount];
02381                 for(int j = 0; j < newRow.Length; j++)
02382                 {
02383                     newRow[j] = _data[j][i];
02384                 }
02385 
02386                 newData[i] = newRow;
02387             }
02388 
02389             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
02390         }
02391 
02399         public
02400         void
02401         TransposeInplace()
02402         {
02403             if(_rowCount != _columnCount)
02404             {
02405                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSquare);
02406             }
02407 
02408             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
02409             {
02410                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
02411                 for(int j = i + 1; j < thisRow.Length; j++)
02412                 {
02413                     Complex swap = _data[j][i];
02414                     _data[j][i] = thisRow[j];
02415                     thisRow[j] = swap;
02416                 }
02417             }
02418 
02419             ResetOnDemandComputations();
02420         }
02421 
02426         public
02427         ComplexMatrix
02428         HermitianTranspose()
02429         {
02430             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[_columnCount][];
02431             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)
02432             {
02433                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[_rowCount];
02434                 for(int j = 0; j < newRow.Length; j++)
02435                 {
02436                     newRow[j] = _data[j][i].Conjugate;
02437                 }
02438 
02439                 newData[i] = newRow;
02440             }
02441 
02442             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
02443         }
02444 
02452         public
02453         void
02454         HermitianTransposeInplace()
02455         {
02456             if(_rowCount != _columnCount)
02457             {
02458                 throw new InvalidOperationException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSquare);
02459             }
02460 
02461             for(int i = 0; i < _data.Length; i++)
02462             {
02463                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
02464                 thisRow[i] = thisRow[i].Conjugate;
02465                 for(int j = i + 1; j < thisRow.Length; j++)
02466                 {
02467                     Complex swap = _data[j][i].Conjugate;
02468                     _data[j][i] = thisRow[j].Conjugate;
02469                     thisRow[j] = swap;
02470                 }
02471             }
02472 
02473             ResetOnDemandComputations();
02474         }
02475 
02483         public
02484         ComplexMatrix
02485         TensorMultiply(
02486             ComplexMatrix B
02487             )
02488         {
02489             return KroneckerProduct(this, B);
02490         }
02491 
02495         public static
02496         ComplexMatrix
02497         KroneckerProduct(
02498             ComplexMatrix A,
02499             ComplexMatrix B
02500             )
02501         {
02502             // Matrix to be created
02503             ComplexMatrix outMat = new ComplexMatrix(A.RowCount * B.RowCount, A.ColumnCount * B.ColumnCount);
02504             Complex[][] Adata = A._data;
02505 
02506             for(int i = 0; i < A.RowCount; i++)
02507             {
02508                 int rowOffset = i * B.RowCount;
02509                 for(int j = 0; j < A.ColumnCount; j++)
02510                 {
02511                     int colOffset = j * B.ColumnCount;
02512                     ComplexMatrix partMat = Adata[i][j] * B;
02513 
02514                     outMat.SetMatrix(
02515                         rowOffset,
02516                         rowOffset + B.RowCount - 1,
02517                         colOffset,
02518                         colOffset + B.RowCount - 1,
02519                         partMat
02520                         );
02521                 }
02522             }
02523 
02524             return outMat;
02525         }
02526

02542             IMatrix<Complex> b
02543             )
02544         {
02545             CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(this, b);
02546 
02547             Complex[][] newData = new Complex[_rowCount][];
02548             for(int i = 0; i < newData.Length; i++)
02549             {
02550                 Complex[] thisRow = _data[i];
02551                 Complex[] newRow = new Complex[_columnCount];
02552                 for(int j = 0; j < newRow.Length; j++)
02553                 {
02554                     newRow[j] = thisRow[j] * b[i, j];
02555                 }
02556 
02557                 newData[i] = newRow;
02558             }
02559 
02560             return new ComplexMatrix(newData);
02561         }

03083         private static
03084         void
03085         CheckMatchingMatrixDimensions(
03086             IMatrix<Complex> A,
03087             IMatrix<Complex> B
03088             )
03089         {
03090             if(A.RowCount != B.RowCount || A.ColumnCount != B.ColumnCount)
03091             {
03092                 throw new ArgumentException(Resources.ArgumentMatrixSameDimensions);
03093             }
03094         }

03107             {

03130 
03134         public override
03135         string
03136         ToString()
03137         {
03138             StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();
03139 
03140             for(int i = 0; i < _rowCount; i++)
03141             {
03142                 if(i == 0)
03143                 {
03144                     sb.Append("[[");
03145                 }
03146                 else
03147                 {
03148                     sb.Append(" [");
03149                 }
03150 
03151                 for(int j = 0; j < _columnCount; j++)
03152                 {
03153                     if(j != 0)
03154                     {
03155                         sb.Append(',');
03156                     }
03157 
03158                     sb.Append(_data[i][j].ToString());
03159                 }
03160 
03161                 if(i == _rowCount - 1)
03162                 {
03163                     sb.Append("]]");
03164                 }
03165                 else
03166                 {
03167                     sb.AppendLine("]");
03168                 }
03169             }
03170 
03171             return sb.ToString();
03172         }
